quest.name: Returning What's Ours
journal: Hinu Vali has decided to have someone embark on a dangerous mission.

Hinu Vali has asked you to steal supplies from the Vundu tribe. She assures you that the success of this request will affect all the Vanu of Ok' Zundu. Go to Ok' Vundu and steal three Zundu offerings.
You have gathered up the supplies from Ok' Vundu territory, though you cannot at the moment reconcile why they seem to be of Zundu origin. Take them back to Hinu Vali to see what she has to say.

You have delivered the offerings to Hinu Vali, and she explains to you that they were traditionally given to the Vundu tribe to ensure safety for the Zundu. However, the Vundu sometimes do not acknowledge these offerings and attack anyway. Given that the offerings are essentially meaningless, they would be most useful if they were returned to the stores of Ok' Zundu.
objectives: Steal Zundu offerings from Ok' Vundu.
Deliver Zundu offerings to Hinu Vali.

dialogue.name: HINUVALI
dialogue.text: Tribe of Zundu faces great distress! Hinu Vali makes foolish request of netherling, like asking herhim to stand on mountain during thunderstorm.

dialogue.name: HINUVALI
dialogue.text: Netherling steals into Ok' Vundu like silent breeze, makes away with supplies. Netherling can only carry so muchâ”€three baskets enough.

dialogue.name: HINUVALI
dialogue.text: Hinu Vali makes dangerous request of netherling, but fate of Zundu tribe relies on success.

dialogue.name: HINUVALI
dialogue.text: Within Ok' Vundu lies a collection of supplies, ripe for taking. Netherling brings back three for benefit of all Ok' Zundu.

dialogue.name: HINUVALI
dialogue.text: Netherling brings supplies on zephyr winds. Is weight of three too much to bear?

dialogue.name: HINUVALI
dialogue.text: Ah! Netherling carries salvation to tribe of Zundu! Tribe forever in netherling's debt.

dialogue.name: HINUVALI
dialogue.text: For many moons, Zundu tribe gives offerings to Vundu, guarantees safety of tribe from violent storm of aggression.

dialogue.name: HINUVALI
dialogue.text: But tribe of Vundu fickle like summer breeze, attacks innocent Zundu tribe as mood dictates. Since offerings mean little to Vundu, Hinu Vali decides to take back offerings.

dialogue.name: HINUVALI
dialogue.text: With netherling's help, stores of Ok' Zundu are restored, just as bountiful harvests after lush rains.
